resources.string: Change the look of the app to your liking by picking a theme of your choice!
Contakts is a beautiful new way to connect with everyone that matters to you.\n\nSimply swipe right anywhere on the screen to open the navigation menu and start connecting with everyone!

Contakts allows you to connect with your Facebook friends easily. Just login to you Facebook account, by tapping on the button below. 

You will be asked to accept permissions, allowing us to present you with all the information you need to keep in touch with your friends.

No personal information is collected or stored by Contakts.
